complaint.description:
ABSOLUTELY RUBBISH!!!!!!!!!!! IM CANCELLING!!!!! STUFF IT, WOULD RATHER PAY FOR SOMETHING IM ACTUALLY GETTING

ONCE AGAIN!!!!! NO SURPRISE!!!! NO INTERNET WITH RAIN ALL DAY NOW!!! TRIED CALLING THEIR SUPPORT LINE AND IF YOU HIT SUPPORT YOUR CALL GETS CUT IF YOU HIT SALES YOU GET TO A CONSULTANT, SO I HAVE SALES GOT A CONSULTANT AND ALL THEY DO IS TRF YOU TO SUPPORT WHO CUTS YOUR CALL!!!! IVE OFFICIALLY PLACED AN ORDER FOR FIBRE AS I CANNOT DEAL WITH THIS USELESS RUBBISH ANYMORE!!! I CANNOT UNDERSTAND WHY ANYONE IS STILL PAYING THIS USELESS BULL**** SCAM OF A PLACE!!!!! HONESTLY IF IM GOING TO PAY FOR NOTHING, I MUSSERWELL SUPPORT A CHARITY WHERE IT WILL BE APPRECIATED.

AND PLEASE DONT BOTHER RESPONDING WITH YOUR ROBOT RESPONSE WHICH GETS YOU NO RESULTS!!!!!!
